= glossary =

== <span id="contextualization">contextualization</span> ==
The process of determining the context of an input. An example [http://code.google.com/p/sibos/wiki/sequences#contextualization here].

== <span id="sourcetargetcontextualization">source/target contextualization</span> ==
Contextualization of the input. The system will search either in the context of execution, or in the context of known the target application/system
